website_summaries.verdict: Offers a 3,000-pound winching capacity, so it can handle the big jobs that you need to do.
pros: Delivers more lifting capability than most hand crank winches at up to 3,000 pounds
Materials consist of zinc-plated steel, so you can be certain they will last in tough or wet conditions
One-piece gear ensures the winch will work a long time
cons: Has a higher price point than some other options, but it does include a strap

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but not as good as the one that came with my boat that broke after 25 years

customer_reviews.text: Works very well. installation was quick and I really enjoy that it is 2 speed

customer_reviews.title: Bought this item July 2017 took boat out to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item July 2017 took boat out to get it ready for spring, and broke now this should not have already wore out or broke in that short of time being boat wasn't taken out after September, and broke already would thing twice before buying this item!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: We used this twice and the handle broke off. Horrible quality....do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: kelly h.

customer_reviews.title: Good= Was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good= Was very easy to install. Bad= I snapped the bolt holding the handle on the very first time using the winch. Now my boat is about 2600lbs and should have pulled my boat up the final 8 inches no problem. And of course I recycled the box it came in and am unable to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this item. It is very poor quality. The welds and components are poor. The hardware it is made with is very soft steel. If you do buy I would not use it for anything weighing over 1000 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good 3000 lb wench using it for 22' pontoon boat trailer.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke on second use. Almost lost my boat luckily a guide bar caught it from floating away.
customer_reviews.author: zackery boone

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Returned; product was not very sturdy and didn't seem like it would last more than a year. Need something more hardy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Denning

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Love that the handle can take off easily and also adjustable.

product_meta.title: Seachoice 52261 Trailer Winch, Max Load 3,000 Pounds, 25-Foot-Long 2-Inch-Wide Strap with Hook
product_meta.description: This Seachoice Trailer Winch makes it easy to pull a boat or personal watercraft onto a trailer, and it keeps the craft securely under your control when unloading it from the trailer. This winch features premium components that deliver reliable performance for the long run. This Trailer Winch features zinc-plated steel construction, 1-piece solid gear, and it is pre-drilled for easy 3-bolt installation on your trailer. It provides 2-way ratchet action with a free spool center position, and it has a 1-inch diameter hub and gear ratio of 4.1:1/9.8:1. A strong, 2-inch-wide, 25-foot-long strap with a hook is included, and this Trailer Winch has a load maximum of an impressive 3,000 pounds. Seachoice is committed to delivering quality marine accessories and OEM replacement parts to satisfy fishing, boating and watersports enthusiasts worldwide. Seachoice is run for and by boaters, offering a wide-ranging product line while remaining affordable.
feature_bullets: Dependable winch enables sure, smooth boat loading and unloading
Durable zinc-plated steel construction and 1-piece solid gear
Provides consistent 2-way ratchet action with a free spool center position
Has a 1-inch diameter hub and gear ratio of 4.1:1/9.8:1
Includes strong, 2-inch-wide, 25-foot-long strap with a hook
Pre-drilled for easy and secure 3-bolt installation on trailer
